posts.post_title: T206 Sale +++ 28 commons ++ get them off my desk
posts.post_content:
Let's move these:

28 commons from such a variety of lots that I had to re-scan them to get organized :(:confused:.  Also so spread out on so many spread sheets I don't know what I paid for them (but more than I asking).  So, my incompetent inventory control may be to someone's advantage :rolleyes:.

$450, delivered.

[url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks, Scott
